entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 12.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this evening then partly cloudy. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 12. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 24. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Clearing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 17 in the evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 25 January 2023
